titleStmt.title: A pleasaunt conceited historie, called The taming of a shrew As it hath beene sundry times acted by the right Honourable the Earle of Pembrooke his Seruants.
Taming of a shrew.
A pleasaunt conceited historie, called The taming of a shrew As it hath beene sundry times acted by the right Honourable the Earle of Pembrooke his Seruants.
Taming of a shrew.

publicationStmt.publisher: By V[alentine] S[immes] for Nicholas Ling, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstons Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The connection with Shakespeare's play is obscure.
